remarks: The virtual deduction form of a 2-antecedent nested implication implies the 2-antecedent nested implication.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 21-Apr-2011.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: dfvd2imp $p |- ( (. ph ,. ps ->. ch ). -> ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) ) $.
